headline: Xylem (XYL) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of water technology company Xylem (NYSE:XYL) jumped 3.2% in the afternoon session after the company announced a partnership with Amazon.com Inc. to deploy smart water technology in Mexico City and Monterrey, aiming to save more than 1.3 billion liters of water annually.

headline: Amazon.com (AMZN) Collaborates On Digital Signage And Advanced Water Management Solutions
summary: Amazon.com (AMZN) experienced an 8% increase in share price over the last quarter, spurred by several developments. The launch of the Amazon Signage Stick, through collaboration with Rockbot, provided small businesses access to affordable digital advertising solutions, likely enhancing Amazon's retail media appeal. Additionally, the partnership with Xylem addressed significant water management challenges in Mexico, aligning with Amazon's global sustainability goals. Despite the prevailing...

headline: Xylem and Amazon Partner on Smart Water Upgrades to Save More Than 1.3 Billion Liters Annually in Mexico
summary: MEXICO CITY, September 11, 2025--Xylem and Amazon are working together with local water utilities to save water and improve supply for residents in Monterrey and Mexico City.
